organizations.title: Organization
organizations.no_organizations_description: Organizations let you manage multiple teams with unified billing and administration. Get started by creating your first organization.
organizations.create_organization_description: Create a new organization to group your teams
organizations.contact_email_help: Primary contact for billing and administrative notifications
organizations.organization_settings_description: Update your organization name and description
organizations.no_teams: No teams in this organization yet
organizations.billing_coming_soon_description: Unified billing and subscription management for all teams in this organization will be available in a future release.
organizations.about_description: Organizations provide unified billing and administration for multiple teams. They're optional - teams can exist independently or be grouped under an organization for centralized management.
organizations.single_user_info_description: Update your company name and organization details here. This information helps personalize your account and can be used for branding features in the future.
organizations.getting_started_description: Create your first organization to manage your company information and prepare for future team collaboration and branding features.
organizations.delete_organization_warning: This will permanently delete the organization and all associated teams. This action cannot be undone.
organizations.delete_organization_confirm_message: Are you sure you want to delete {name}? This action cannot be undone.
